references.paper_title: A review on multi-label learning algorithms
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of multi-label learning algorithms, which is the fundamental concept of the research in this paper.

references.paper_title: CNN-RNN: A Unified Framework for Multi-Label Image Classification
references.reason: This paper proposes a unified framework for multi-label image classification by combining CNNs and RNNs, which is a common approach used for multi-label image classification.

references.paper_title: General Multi-Label Image Classification with Transformers
references.reason: This paper explores a transformer-based approach for multi-label image classification, which has shown promise in recent years.

references.paper_title: Class-Distribution-Aware Pseudo-Labeling for Semi-Supervised Multi-Label Learning
references.reason: This paper focuses on semi-supervised multi-label learning, which directly addresses the problem studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: SoftMatch: Addressing the Quantity-Quality Trade-off in Semi-Supervised Learning
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it introduces SoftMatch, a semi-supervised learning method that the current paper compares against.
